chapters.title: Approach
chapters.description: Person approaches the staircase without holding the handrail. This triggers a non-compliant state immediately.

chapters.title: Grip Rail
chapters.description: Person grabs the left handrail. After debounce period, state transitions to compliant.

chapters.title: Phone Usage
chapters.description: While still holding the rail, person raises phone to ear. Phone heuristic triggers based on wrist-to-ear distance.

chapters.title: Release Rail
chapters.description: Person releases handrail while still on phone. Transitions back to non-compliant state.

chapters.title: Exit
chapters.description: Person exits the staircase area. Final summary of detected events.
